title: Poison Aches
description: "Everything about Emmett was addictive, alluring, captivating. . .but I could just about sense the brooding, angry, impassiveness about him that made him that much more dangerous. He almost seemed like a god that no one could really touch or affect. He simply didn't care anymore."STAY TUNED. . . Dates and cover reveal to follow.
author: Thandie
